sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Springfield High Speed Railroad Community Advisory Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Springfield High Speed Railroad Community Advisory Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. For purposes of this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. For purposes of this Act:

sections.heading: Springfield High Speed Railroad Community Advisory Commission
sections.text: The Springfield High Speed Railroad Community Advisory Commission ("Commission") is created to monitor, review, and report on contracting and employment matters related to the planning, organization, and construction of the High Speed Ra

sections.heading: Commission meetings; authority; reporting
sections.text: The Commission shall meet quarterly. The Commission shall have the authority to convene City, County, and Department officials to ensure transparency and compliance with federal, State, and local employment and contracting goals.

sections.heading: Applicability. If the implementation of any of the provisions of this Act would negatively affect the receipt of federal funding, then those provisions shall not apply
sections.text: Applicability. If the implementation of any of the provisions of this Act would negatively affect the receipt of federal funding, then those provisions shall not apply.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
